overview: After Alvin Lee’s death in March of 2013, Rainman Records released The Last Show, a fine recording of Lee’s final on stage performance in May of 2012. Due to the excellence of that recording, I looked forward to hearing the recent Rainman release, British Live Performance Series. It captures Ten Years After (TYA) recorded live in 1990 at “Studio 8” television in Nottingham, England.  1 Let’s Shake It Up  2 Good Morning Little Schoolgirl  3 Slow Blues in C  4 Hobbit  5 Love Like A Man  6 Johnny B. Goode  7 Bad Blood  8 Victim of Circumstance  9 I Can’t Keep From Crying Sometime  10 I’m Going Home  11 Sweet Little Sixteen
title: Ten Years After Live Nottingham
